snippet.title: Fatal Run 2089 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
The year is 2089. You are racing to save the world, keeping the ARC reactor alive while dodging falling buildings and blowing up enemy vehicles in your way. There is an array of weapons and paths to choose from as you upgrade your deadly vehicle and take down formidable bosses. Do you have what it takes to survive your Fatal Run? 

Wishlist Fatal Run: https://atari.com/products/fatal-run-2089

Join the conversation on Discord: https://link.atari.com/discord

Follow Atari
Twitter: https://twitter.com/atari
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atari
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atari/
